availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Susan Miller. Father of Ellis H. Miller and Mildred Jane Miller. Married to Nancy M. Blaylock Miller in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in May 1854. Father of Margaret A. Miller, William J. Miller, Mary Elizabeth Miller, Pamela Miller, Emily C. Miller, W. N. Miller, F. D. Miller, and S. M. Miller. Famer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1860. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1863.

ab.bibl:

Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Pollard's Tan-yard Division, p. 153-54.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Bucksnort, p. 415B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War) NARA RG 110, Caldwell County, KY, June 1863, p. 14.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994029, Caldwell County Births, 1856.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994029, Caldwell County Births, 1857.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film #000546372, p 160.
